Location & Schedule

Liberty Two, 32nd Floor - 50 South 16th St. Philadelphia, PA 19102

February 21, 2012
Presentations: 6pm - 8:30pm
After party: 8:30pm - the end

Call For Proposals Open

14 Nov 2011
Angel Pizarro

Our Call for Proposals is open! Last year’s talks were really fantastic, and we are expecting that the excellent developer community here in the greater Philadelphia area can level-up to do themselves one better. So put your thinking caps on and start sending proposals to info@redsnakephilly.org.
